task_definition_name: When Maker Checker Is Enabled, The Popup To Change The Password Does Not Disappear After You Submit
description:
. Enable maker checker Admin -> System -> Configurations -> Enable maker checker
2. Create a user and fill all necessary fields and submit Admin -> User -> New User
3. Then go and view a user.
4. Click "change password" and fill the new password.

Refer the link for screenshots:
